overview:
Kenny Johnston is the CEO and founder of AppCreations, Inc., a Ruby on Rails web development firm that builds and hosts web applications for small businesses.

Through AppCreations, Inc., Kenny Johnston provides development and system administration services for New Leaders. He has worked on a variety of projects with New Leaders and is part of their forward-thinking efforts in revolutionizing web application development through Ruby on Rails.

Mr. Johnston has recently received a Bachelor’s of Science in Business Administration with a focus in Management Information Systems (MIS) from California State University, Sacramento. He has a background in systems administration and has worked with various web and software development technologies for over a decade

degrees.subject: Business Administration with a focus in Management Information Systems
Computer Service Technology with a focus in Networking
